topic.title: Updated WEB-based Shared Translation Memory concept

body.p: The Shared Translation Memory concept, that uses as the WEB-based translation memory did not meet the expectations. So we decided to re-design this solution, now being fully based on own code.
The solution is based on a server component, that is mainly represented by MariaDB.

Since we still need to do some updates on this solution, we provide the solution as is, but encourage testers to perform some tests. The documentation is not fully authored in DITA, so we ask the test team members to use the document Shared_Translation_Memory_UsersGuide.pdf provided to the test teams.
See also the information on page
